product_name: DysonSpecial Edition Airwrap i.d. Multi-styler Straight+Wavy
summary: SummaryAchieve perfect curls at the touch of a button with Dyson's Special edition Airwrap i.d. multi-styler. A faster, easier way to achieve more consistent curls^ with no heat damage. Engineered for straight to wavy hair. 6-in-1 versatility. Dry, curl, wave, straighten, smooth and volumize.
details: DetailsBenefitsApp-enabled multi-styler. Recommends a personalized curling routine according to your hair and styling profile.i.d. curlâ„¢ helps to create perfect curls, every time.Six versatile attachments engineered to dry, curl, shape, smooth and hide flyaways for straight and wavy hair.Dries and styles simultaneously using the Coanda effect, no heat damage.FeaturesBluetoothÂ® wireless technology enabled to create a personalized curling routine according to your hair profile in the MyDysonâ„¢ app.Coanda styling pioneered by Dyson: The Dyson Airwrapâ„¢ multi-styler harnesses an aerodynamic phenomenon called the Coanda effect. It uses air to attract and wrap hair to the barrel or surface of the brush.Powered by the Dyson digital motor V9: The 13-blade impeller spins at up to 110,000rpm, generating 3.2kPa. Powerful enough to produce the air pressure that creates the Coanda effect.Intelligent heat control: Measures airflow temperature over 40 times a second, intelligently controlling the heating element to prevent heat damage.Negative ions: Charged particles in the airflow help reduce static in the hair.IncludesConical barrel to style close to the root, for defined curls in all hair types.2-in-1 Dryer+Flyaway smoother to dry damp hair and smooth finished styles with the Coanda effect.Large round volumizing brush to add body and shape longer hair as it dries.Soft smoothing brush to gently align and smooth fine hair with increased control for straighter styles.1.6" Airwrapâ„¢ long barrel to create voluminous curls and waves in both directions.Fast dryer to take hair from wet to damp so it's ready for stylings.Filter cleaning brush to quickly clean your Dyson Airwrapâ„¢ filter.Special edition Presentation case to protect and neatly store your Dyson Airwrapâ„¢ multi-styler and attachments. Finished in black with a red stripe, cushioned with soft fabric and with a removable lid that is also a non-slip mat for your Airwrapâ„¢.Item 2644209How To UseConnect to the MyDysonâ„¢ app and take a simple quiz to create a personalized hair profile.Enable features such as the i.d. curlâ„¢ personalized curling sequence to wrap, style and set your curls, automatically.Receive tailored how-to content and a personalized curling routine based on your hair type.On first use, your machine will default to the recommended temperature and airflow. You can change these as you style.Styling TipsFor best results, start with freshly washed hair. Use the Fast dryer to take hair from damp to about 80% dry.Use the Conical barrel for a defined curl.Use the Smoothing brush to smooth hair if needed before curling.Power on your Dyson Airwrap i.d.â„¢ and slide thumb up on power button to begin i.d. curl sequence.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Connect to the MyDysonâ„¢ app and take a simple quiz to create a personalized hair profile.Enable features such as the i.d. curlâ„¢ personalized curling sequence to wrap, style and set your curls, automatically.Receive tailored how-to content and a personalized curling routine based on your hair type.On first use, your machine will default to the recommended temperature and airflow. You can change these as you style.Styling TipsFor best results, start with freshly washed hair. Use the Fast dryer to take hair from damp to about 80% dry.Use the Conical barrel for a defined curl.Use the Smoothing brush to smooth hair if needed before curling.Power on your Dyson Airwrap i.d.â„¢ and slide thumb up on power button to begin i.d. curl sequence.

reviews.comments: First time owner and obsessed I've lost alot of hair because of my burns so i occasionally wear wigs. Works wonders on wigs human or synthetic.

reviews.headline: Love love love
reviews.comments: I love my new dyson airwrap. I have the dyson corral and the blow dryer and super excited to add this beauty to my collection. It paired super quick to my phone. It looks beautiful and all the attachments work amazing!!! Honestly i just love to stare at it bc its so beautiful. Super lightweight and dries my hair very quick. Im so glad i made the purchase. And with the 20% coupon definitely felt like i got a deal and wirh my ulta points!!!
